scripts.start: export DEV_ENV=${DEV_ENV:-qa} &&  node scripts/build/gen_files_by_env.cjs && webpack serve --mode development --config webpack.config.cjs
scripts.add_tags_prod: git tag -a PROD-$(date "+%Y-%m-%d-%H.%M") -m "Deployed to PROD by ${GITHUB_ACTOR:-$(whoami)}" && git push --tags
scripts.deploy_prod: npm run add_tags_prod && npm run deploy_gzip_prod
scripts.deploy_prod_frontend: npm run add_tags_prod && dfx build modclub --network ic && dfx generate modclub --network ic && dfx generate modclub_assets --network ic && DEV_ENV=production dfx deploy modclub_assets --network ic
scripts.deploy_gzip_prod: dfx build --network ic modclub && gzip -f .dfx/ic/canisters/modclub/modclub.wasm && dfx canister install --network ic  --wasm .dfx/ic/canisters/modclub/modclub.wasm.gz --mode upgrade modclub && DEV_ENV=prod dfx deploy --network ic modclub_assets
scripts.deploy_gzip_prod_no_frontend: dfx build --network ic modclub && gzip -f .dfx/ic/canisters/modclub/modclub.wasm && dfx canister install --network ic  --wasm .dfx/ic/canisters/modclub/modclub.wasm.gz --mode upgrade modclub
scripts.deploy_gzip_dev: dfx build --network ic modclub_dev && gzip -f .dfx/ic/canisters/modclub_dev/modclub_dev.wasm && dfx canister install --network ic  --wasm .dfx/ic/canisters/modclub_dev/modclub_dev.wasm.gz --mode upgrade modclub_dev && DEV_ENV=dev dfx deploy --network ic --no-wallet modclub_dev_assets
scripts.quick_build: ~/.cache/dfinity/versions/0.15.2/moc ./src/modclub/main.mo -o ./.dfx/local/canisters/modclub_qa/modclub_qa.wasm -c --debug --idl --stable-types --public-metadata candid:service --public-metadata candid:args --actor-idl ./.dfx/local/canisters/idl/ --actor-alias modclub_qa $(dfx canister id modclub_qa) --package base .mops/base@0.9.7/src --package base-0.7.3 .mops/_github/base-0.7.3#aafcdee0c8328087aeed506e64aa2ff4ed329b47/src --package base-0.10.0 .mops/base@0.10.0/src --package uuid .mops/_github/uuid#v0.2.0/src --package encoding .mops/_github/encoding#v0.3.1/src --package array .mops/_github/array#v0.1.1/src --package io .mops/_github/io#v0.3.1/src --package crypto .mops/_github/crypto#v0.2.0/src --package rand .mops/_github/rand#v0.2.2/src --package json .mops/_github/json#v0.2.0/src --package parser-combinators .mops/_github/parser-combinators#v0.1.1/src --package serde .mops/serde@2.0.4/src --package itertools .mops/itertools@0.1.2/src --package candid .mops/candid@1.0.2/src --package xtended-numbers .mops/xtended-numbers@0.2.1/src --package map .mops/map@8.1.0/src --package motoko-sequence .mops/_github/motoko-sequence#master@366c4191d856ed4842267f5ab89d7222ed2d71d0/src --package motoko-matchers .mops/_github/motoko-matchers#master@3dac8a071b69e4e651b25a7d9683fe831eb7cffd/src --package backup .mops/backup@1.1.1/src --package linked-list .mops/linked-list@0.1.0/src --package http-types .mops/http-types@1.0.0/src --package motoko-datetime .mops/_github/motoko-datetime#v0.1.1/src -v --max-stable-pages 786432 -no-check-ir
scripts.quick_build_2: ~/.cache/dfinity/versions/0.15.2/moc ./src/rs/main.mo -o ./.dfx/local/canisters/rs_qa/rs_qa.wasm -c --debug --idl --stable-types --public-metadata candid:service --public-metadata candid:args --actor-idl ./.dfx/local/canisters/idl/ --actor-alias modclub_qa $(dfx canister id rs_qa) --package base .mops/base@0.9.7/src --package base-0.7.3 .mops/_github/base-0.7.3#aafcdee0c8328087aeed506e64aa2ff4ed329b47/src --package base-0.10.0 .mops/base@0.10.0/src --package uuid .mops/_github/uuid#v0.2.0/src --package encoding .mops/_github/encoding#v0.3.1/src --package array .mops/_github/array#v0.1.1/src --package io .mops/_github/io#v0.3.1/src --package crypto .mops/_github/crypto#v0.2.0/src --package rand .mops/_github/rand#v0.2.2/src --package json .mops/_github/json#v0.2.0/src --package parser-combinators .mops/_github/parser-combinators#v0.1.1/src --package serde .mops/serde@2.0.4/src --package itertools .mops/itertools@0.1.2/src --package candid .mops/candid@1.0.2/src --package xtended-numbers .mops/xtended-numbers@0.2.1/src --package map .mops/map@8.1.0/src --package motoko-sequence .mops/_github/motoko-sequence#master@366c4191d856ed4842267f5ab89d7222ed2d71d0/src --package motoko-matchers .mops/_github/motoko-matchers#master@3dac8a071b69e4e651b25a7d9683fe831eb7cffd/src --package backup .mops/backup@1.1.1/src --package linked-list .mops/linked-list@0.1.0/src --package http-types .mops/http-types@1.0.0/src --package motoko-datetime .mops/_github/motoko-datetime#v0.1.1/src -v --max-stable-pages 786432 -no-check-ir
